title: post api ai chat endpoint
description: Verify that the POST /api/ai/chat endpoint correctly processes chat requests, returns appropriate AI-generated clinical suggestions, and handles invalid input gracefully.

title: post api ai insights endpoint
description: Test the POST /api/ai/insights endpoint to ensure it returns accurate AI-generated insights for patients and handles error scenarios properly.

title: post api ai recommendations endpoint
description: Validate the POST /api/ai/recommendations endpoint to confirm it provides relevant AI-based recommendations for patients and manages invalid requests appropriately.
